description: A lightweight version of their Coefficient fleece in a quarter-zip style, the Coefficient LT Quarter Zip Pro is a performance midlayer built for high- output activities. Featuring Polartec® Power Grid® Fleece with a gridded interior for increased wicking performance and added breathability, the center- front quarter zip allows you to dump heat on the go, while the hoodless-style makes this an easy layer with other hooded jackets.
name: Black Diamond Coefficient LT 1/4-Zip Pullover - Mens

specs.value: Polartec Powergrid polyester stretch grid back fleece - 90% Polyester, 10% Elastane, 119 g
